detail_desc: Cropped, fitted top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders.

Ankle-length kaftan in softly draping, jacquard-weave viscose with a sheen. Round neckline with gathers to create soft draping, an opening with narrow ties at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in cotton denim. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, buttons down the front and a tie belt at the waist. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.

Playsuit in an airy viscose and linen weave with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed press-stud at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and diagonal side pockets. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in jersey with short sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in jersey with short sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in jersey with short sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Elastic-trimmed hood with ears at the top, two concealed zips down the front for easy changing, and long sleeves with foldover mitts to keep the hands warm. Soft fleece lining made from recycled polyester.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Elastic-trimmed hood with ears at the top, two concealed zips down the front for easy changing, and long sleeves with foldover mitts to keep the hands warm. Soft fleece lining made from recycled polyester.

Padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Elastic-trimmed hood with ears at the top, two concealed zips down the front for easy changing, and long sleeves with foldover mitts to keep the hands warm. Soft fleece lining made from recycled polyester.
Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Set with a hoodie and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbed sections. Hoodie with an extra-wide neckline, jersey-lined hood and a kangaroo pocket with a small fabric appliqué. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves and press-studs at the back of one shoulder.

Hooded jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn either as a jacket or as a thermal mid layer. Zip down the front, extra-long raglan sleeves for increased mobility and minimal friction with thumbholes at the cuffs to help retain warmth outdoors, and a zipped chest pocket for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Some of the polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

Zip down the front, extra-long raglan sleeves for increased mobility and minimal friction with thumbholes at the cuffs to help retain warmth outdoors, and a zipped chest pocket for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Some of the polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Tube top in soft jersey. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Long skirt in woven fabric with a draped front, high slit and asymmetric hem. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined at the top.
Long skirt in woven fabric with a draped front, high slit and asymmetric hem. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined at the top.

Wide trousers in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with a high waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Thong briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Scarf in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with fringe trims.

5-pocket, calf-length skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. Unlined.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cropped shirt in a shimmering metallic weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cycling shorts in stretch jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour flatlock seams.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cropped top in stretch jersey with contrasting colour flatlock seams.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline, V-shaped opening and pleats at the front.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic slub cotton jersey with buttons down the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Loose-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and adjustable tab with a button at each side. Pockets in the side seams and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Wide trousers in cotton twill with a high waist, pleats at the top and wide legs with close-fitting hems. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and front and back pockets.

Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an intarsia motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top and pair of matching sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams. Top with a wide elastic hem and a small cut-out section between the racer back and hem. Sports tights with wide, covered elastication at the waist and inset side stripes.
Short skirt in a crêpe weave with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and buttons down the front. Lined.

Bralette in lace and mesh with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Cap in cotton twill with a print motif front and back and an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Metal hair clips decorated with glittery fabric butterflies. Length 3.5 cm.
Vest top in cotton jersey doubled with a layer of mesh on the front. Ribbing around the neckline and armholes, a print motif on the front, and an appliqué at the front of the hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey doubled with a layer of mesh on the front. Ribbing around the neckline and armholes, a print motif on the front, and an appliqué at the front of the hem.
Long-sleeved top in block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a text motif down the sleeves. Double-layered, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem that creates a boxy look.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a text motif down the sleeves. Double-layered, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem that creates a boxy look.
Fully lined, lace-patterned bikini. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, one of which has a small metal decoration.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Elasticated scrunchies in sheer organza.
Low-necked vest top in soft linen jersey.

Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short, glittery tulle puff sleeves with narrow elastication.

Wide, padded fabric-covered Alice band with soft imitation suede on the inside.
Sleeveless romper suit in ribbed, patterned, organic cotton jersey. Wide shoulder straps with button fastenings, patch front pockets and wide fold-up ribbing at the hems. Lined at the top.

Set with a pair of trousers and long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton. Trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with a patch pocket on one leg, wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and covered elastication at the hems. Jersey boat-neck top with a button on each shoulder, a ribbed trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ears at the top, embroidery on the front and a ribbed trim with ties. Lining in soft, organic cotton jersey.
